file_content.text: Empire is sending me a new master. We will rebuild the facility.
Did you clear out the facility? Is it safe from the Republic?
I took care of it.
Very good. Thank you.
That was quite a fight.
I am sorry there is trouble.
Don't get too excited.
You may not think so, but I am grateful.
My master leave me something in his will. I give to you in thanks.
The facility? Is it safe from the Republic?
Imperial master, please. I served one like you.
Ah, my lord, yes, ah, excuse me. It is just one tiny problem. Well, not tiny exactly. Tiny for you. For me, very big.
Friend of the Empire. Please hear my words.
Friends of the Empire. Please hear my words.
I am Imperial slave, yes? My master is military interrogator. Erm, was. Was military interrogator. Dead now.
What happened?
Do you have a point?
No, no! Not waste time.
That's a shame.
I am sad for him, but it does not matter. A slave is never without a master.
Is top secret interrogation of captured Republic spies. Is going well. My master use advanced methods. Very painful. Learn lots of secrets.
Then something happen. Something awful. Spy starts to use Force... like Sith. Kills everyone, frees other prisoners. Only I escape.
How very fascinating....
Wait... what?
First, spy refuse to talk. My master press harder. Then spy use lightning! Kill my master.
They must be stopped.
Prisoners control the facility now. Will tell Republic about secret interrogation facility. Need to take back facility. Defeat Republic prisoners. Please.
Stand back. I'll handle it.
All right, I'll do it already.
Thank you. They are dangerous men. Well trained. And watch out for the one that uses the Force.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Better things to do than help the Empire? I am sorry, I am only a slave. I do not understand these things.
I am only a slave. It is not my place to talk.
